text: Philip Kotler (born May 27, 1931) is an American marketing author, consultant, and professor. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. He works at Northwestern University. He is the author of over 60 marketing books. He is an expert at marketing and capitalism.“What Next?” – An Interview with Philip Kotler on the Future of Marketing" (The Marketing Journal), January 15, 2016 He studied at DePaul University. ==References== ==Other websites== * PKotler.org * The Marketing Journal * FixCapitalism.com * Confronting Capitalism Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Educators from Chicago Category:DePaul University alumni Category:Writers from Chicago
